ARABIC: ٱحْشُرُوا۟ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ وَأَزْوَٰجَهُمْ وَمَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْبُدُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Assemble those who did wrong together with their associates and what they worshipped
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Gather all the wicked together and their comrades, and those they had worshipped
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (Then will the command be given): “Muster all the wrong-doers and their spouses and the deities whom they used to serve
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (God will command the angels), "Gather together the unjust, their spouses, and what they had worshipped
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “Gather all the unjust persons and their spouses, and all that they used to worship!” –
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: (It will be said to the angels:) Assemble those who did wrong, together with their companions and what they used to worship,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Gather together those who were unjust and their associates, and what they used to worship
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Muster those who did evil, their wives, and that they were serving,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: (And it is said unto the angels): Assemble those who did wrong, together with their wives and what they used to worship
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: But We shall say, "Assemble those who did wrong together with their associates and what they worshipped
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Gather together those who did wrong and their comrades and that which they were wont to worship
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: ‘Muster the wrongdoers and their mates and what they used to worship
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Bring ye up", it shall be said, "The wrong-doers and their wives, and the things they worshipped-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: (It will be said to the angels): "Assemble those who did wrong, together with their companions (from the devils) and what they used to worship.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Gather together the evildoers, their wives, and that they were worshipping,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Gather those who did wrong, and their mates, and what they used to worship.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [The angels will be ordered], "Gather those who committed wrong, their kinds, and what they used to worship
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:22] It is then said to the angels: ‘Gather those who did wrong, to their own souls through idolatry, together with their mates, their associates from among the devils, and what they used to worship,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Allah would then say to the angels: (Assemble those who did wrong) assemble those who associated partners with Allah, (together with their wives) with their friends and those who are of their calibre from among the jinn, humans and satans (and what they used to worship) of idols
